content:
John: "Now, in order for you to fully experience the camp and all it has to offer, I will need you to remove your clothing. It's all part of the camp's culture and helps everyone feel equal and comfortable."

Samantha: (innocently blushing) "Oh, okay."

Jack: (innocently nodding) "Sure thing."

John: "Now, I understand you two have a special bond. So, I want to assure you that you will be able to sleep together. We believe in respecting everyone's boundaries and choices here at the camp."

Samantha: (innocently smiling) "Thank you, that's very kind of you."

Jack: (innocently smiling) "Yeah, thank you."

John: "Of course, now let's get you two settled in and ready to start your week here at the camp."
